text: When you register as a Customer and use the Services we will collect the following information as listed below.
If you successfully authorized Zoom, Airgram will collect your Zoom meeting information, Zoom UID, and authorization status.
We may also share transcripts with AI (such as GPT or Claude) to create AI-generated content (including AI summary, AI chatbot, and other AI features).
These third parties may use cookies, web beacons, or other unique identifiers to track your use of the Services.

We retain web cookies for up to two weeks whenever the user logs out of Services.
We use session cookies to retain login status and state in a particular session when using Airgram via a web browser.
We store a copy of the recording, the associated transcript, speaker ID, key phrases, and other related metadata until it is deleted by the user.

We may also share Personal Information or Customer Data as necessary to comply with legal or regulatory requirements and to respond to lawful requests, court orders, and legal processes, as well as, to protect and defend the rights, property, or safety of us or third parties, including enforcing contracts or policies, or in connection with investigating and preventing fraud.
We keep your email address until you delete your account by sending an email to support@airgram.io .
We may also share transcripts with AI (such as GPT or Claude) to create AI-generated content (including AI summary, AI chatbot, and other AI features).
These third parties may use cookies, web beacons, or other unique identifiers to track your use of the Services.

data_type: record conversation from third party source
text: We process all recorded conversations from third-party sources the same way we process recordings directly captured via the Services, but we will not use any data in aggregate for Automatic Speech Recognition (ASR).

We process the resultant transcript to create an AI summary, provide information, and answer questions through an AI chatbot interface (Airgram Chat).
We process the resultant transcript to derive key phrases and other summary data and assign a speaker ID if the speaker is enrolled by the user.
We use services provided by a number of third parties to process usage and certain device data for business intelligence and troubleshooting purposes.
We may also share transcripts with AI (such as GPT or Claude) to create AI-generated content (including AI summary, AI chatbot, and other AI features).
We may also share transcripts with AI (such as GPT or Claude) to create AI-generated content (including AI summary, AI chatbot, and other AI features).
We keep your Zoom information until you disconnect Zoom or delete your account.
